title: The future of desert solar power
teaser: Solar facilities like Ivanpah could be the future -- or, they could be a footnote in the history of clean energy.
contentencoded:
A new solar power plant, Ivanpah, is getting ready to come online in California's Mojave Desert. Solar facilities like Ivanpah could be the future -- or, they could be a footnote in the history of clean energy.

Dave Levitan, who has been reporting on desert solar power plants for Scientific American, joins Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson to discuss.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, July 2, 2013
